General.Name: Satria Antaran Prima Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Satria Antaran Prima Tbk operates as an android-based shipping service company in Indonesia. It offers cash on delivery; last mile delivery; warehouse management; same day and one day delivery; regular delivery; international shipping; and label, packaging, and wood packing services. PT Satria Antaran Prima Tbk was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.
General.Address: Revenue Tower lt. 27 No. 123, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12190
